The presence of a video showing a man mi: which was claimed to be adulterated milk being supplied in flood-hit areas.
The caption and description accompanying: which indicated that the milk was being supplied to flood-affected people and urged viewers to spread the video.
The date and source of the video: which was posted by Akash Ahale on Monday, August 12, 2019.
The identification of clues within the v: such as the man wearing a cap with the words "Duque Presidente" (indicating a connection to the President of Colombia) and a can with the imprint "Tronador D" (suggesting the use of a herbicide not available in India).
